text: Rocco Domenico "Rocky" Colavito Jr (August 10, 1933 - December 10, 2024) was an American baseball player. He played outfield. He began playing on the Cleveland Indians in September 1955, playing in 5 games. He later played for the Detroit Tigers, Kansas City Athletics, Chicago White Sox, Los Angeles Dodgers and the New York Yankees. He was born in New York City. Colavito died at his home in Bernville, Pennsylvania, on December 10, 2024 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Kansas City Athletics players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:New York Yankees players
title: Rocky Colavito
